scripts.secrets:fetch: npm run secrets:logout && cross-env-shell BW_SESSION=`npx bw login product@bitsofgood.org --raw` "npm run secrets:sync"
scripts.secrets-staging:fetch: npx bw login --apikey; echo $BW_PASSWORD | npx bw sync; echo $BW_PASSWORD | npx bw get item $BW_ITEM | npx fx .notes > .env
scripts.secrets:sync: npx bw sync && npx bw get item $BW_ITEM | npx fx .notes > ".env"
